sentences.sContent: If the star spun just 20% faster, the centrifugal force would fling it apart.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the star spun just 20% faster, the centrifugal force would fling it apart.
sentences.sCn: 如果该恒星的旋转加快仅仅20%，那么离心力就会其撕裂。

sentences.sContent: Sometimes they also involve centrifugal forces, as the foreign minister, Manouchehr Mottaki, has discovered.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sometimes they also involve centrifugal forces, as the foreign minister, Manouchehr Mottaki, has discovered.
sentences.sCn: 就像外长穆塔基认为的那样有时他们也身处离心力之中。

sentences.sContent: Those forces affecting the wine were the centrifugal force pushing the liquid to the outside of the glass and the gravitational force shoving the liquid back down.
sentences.sContent_eng: Those forces affecting the wine were the centrifugal force pushing the liquid to the outside of the glass and the gravitational force shoving the liquid back down.
sentences.sCn: 这些影响着葡萄酒的力是将葡萄酒推出葡萄酒杯的离心力和将液体拉回来的重力。

phrases.pCn: 离心式风扇；离心式鼓风机
[机械工程]离心分离；[机械工程]离心分离法
离心分离机；离心澄清机

remMethod.val: centri(中心) + fug(逃跑) + al → 逃离中心的 → 离心的

words.tran: 离心机；[机][化工] 离心分离机
用离心机分离；使…受离心作用

trans.tranOther: acting, moving, or tending to move away from a centre
